Method new()

Usage

Boin$new(target, cohort_max, enroll_max)

Arguments

target

Target toxicity rate

cohort_max

Upper bound on dose-wise enrollment

enroll_max

Upper bound on total enrollment

Details

Create a new Boin object.

A Boin object.
